title: Your Shop Tickets
body:
I see a lot of discussions regarding the tickets for the old "your shop" going around. I had dark star Orianna myself and have sendt in a ticket, but i was wondering what the estimated time for the reply on getting the skin on sale was.

Best Regards
Duck

replies.body: Our volume on this is super high right now!  We're getting back to requests as fast as we can, though, it may take a little bit.  Hang tight!
